data.lyric:
[ti:Jingle Bell Rock]
[ar:Bobby Helms]
[al:Old Time Country Christmas]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Jingle Bell Rock - Bobby Helms
[00:04.44]Composed by：Bobby Helms
[00:08.88]Jingle bell jingle bell jingle bell rock
[00:12.93]Jingle bells chime in jingle bell time
[00:17.02]Snowin' and blowin' up bushels of fun
[00:21.40]Now the jingle hop has begun
[00:25.18]Jingle bell jingle bell jingle bell rock
[00:29.14]Jingle bells chime in jingle bell time
[00:33.20]Dancin' and prancin' in Jingle Bell Square
[00:37.74]In the frosty air
[00:40.78]What a bright time it's the right time
[00:45.43]To rock the night away
[00:49.05]Jingle bell time is a swell time
[00:53.97]To go glidin' in a one-horse sleigh
[00:57.77]Giddy-up jingle horse pick up your feet
[01:01.90]Jingle around the clock
[01:06.11]Mix and a-mingle in the jinglin' feet
[01:10.33]That's the jingle bell rock
[01:14.19]Jingle bell jingle bell jingle bell rock
[01:18.22]Jingle bells chime in jingle bell time
[01:22.30]Dancin' and prancin' in Jingle Bell Square
[01:26.83]In the frosty air
[01:29.71]What a bright time it's the right time
[01:34.34]To rock the night away
[01:37.90]Jingle bell time is a swell time
[01:42.85]To go glidin' in a one-horse sleigh
[01:46.68]Giddy-up jingle horse pick up your feet
[01:50.73]Jingle around the clock
[01:54.89]Mix and a-mingle in the jinglin' feet
[01:59.08]That's the jingle bell
[02:01.07]That's the jingle bell
[02:03.06]That's the jingle bell rock
data.trans:
[ti:Jingle Bell Rock]
[ar:Bobby Helms]
[al:Old Time Country Christmas]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:04.44]//
[00:08.88]叮叮当 叮叮当 铃儿响叮当
[00:12.93]叮叮当 叮叮当 铃儿响叮当
[00:17.02]今晚滑雪多快乐 我们坐在雪橇上
[00:21.40]现在舞会已经开始了
[00:25.18]叮叮当 叮叮当 铃儿响叮当
[00:29.14]铃铛响起真悦耳
[00:33.20]在广场里雀跃跳舞
[00:37.74]天气冷的都结霜了
[00:40.78]多快乐啊 现在正是时候
[00:45.43]把夜晚赶走
[00:49.05]铃声响起就是最棒的时候
[00:53.97]驾着单马雪橇往前滑
[00:57.77]起身吧 马儿 准备要走了
[01:01.90]日以继夜不要停
[01:06.11]随着叮当响声向前
[01:10.33]铃儿响叮当
[01:14.19]叮叮当 叮叮当 铃儿响叮当
[01:18.22]叮叮当 叮叮当 铃儿响叮当

[01:26.83]天气冷的都结霜了
[01:29.71]多快乐啊 现在正是时候
[01:34.34]把夜晚赶走
[01:37.90]铃声响起就是最棒的时候
[01:42.85]驾着单马雪橇往前滑
[01:46.68]起身吧 马儿 准备要走了
[01:50.73]日以继夜不要停

[01:59.08]铃儿响叮当
[02:01.07]铃儿响叮当
